+class SimpleScopedGraphDefTest(trt_test.TfTrtIntegrationTestBase):
+
+  def GetParams(self):
+    """Create a graph containing multiple segment."""
+    # TODO(aaroey): test graph with different dtypes.

+        conv_filter = constant_op.constant(
+            [[[[1., 0.5, 4., 6., 0.5, 1.], [1., 0.5, 1., 1., 0.5, 1.]]]],
+            name="weights",
+            dtype=dtype)
+        conv = nn.conv2d(
+            input=inp,
+            filter=conv_filter,
+            strides=[1, 2, 2, 1],
+            padding="SAME",
+            name="conv")

+            np.random.randn(input_dims[0], 12, 12, 6), dtype=dtype)
+        p = conv * c1
+        c2 = constant_op.constant(
+            np.random.randn(input_dims[0], 12, 12, 6), dtype=dtype)
+        q = conv / c2
+
+        edge = self.trt_incompatible_op(q)
+        with nv_scope(select=False):
body:
This is only testing `select=False`.
How about `select=True`?
How about testing other arguments of `nv_scope`?
